EmailTemplate.name: $100 Amazon Gift Card for 30 Minute Meeting, $1000 Charity Donation (1490391685.
EmailTemplate.subject: $100 Amazon Gift Card for 30 Minute Meeting, $1000 Charity Donation (1490391685.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, We recently launched our Infrastructure Optimization Survey <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/m000Zg10g0cg9gZyIe00ZH0]]>, and are offering a $25 Amazon gift card for completing the 5 minute survey by April 1st. We are also offering $100 Amazon gift card for agreeing to a 30 minute meeting with a Turbonomic engineer (meeting must complete by April 15th). If at the end of the meeting, you choose to engage in a proof of value, we will donate $1,000 to the 501(c)(3) charity of your choosing. I’m sure you get hundreds of emails each week from vendors, which is why we wanted to take a moment to let you know we understand your time is extremely valuable and extend an offer to partner with you to support a cause that is close to you. I look forward to the opportunity to speak with you about the benefits Turbonomic can bring to your infrastructure!
Best,
